name: Happy Birthday Mr. Monster!
description:
The Birthday Muffins are here to wish everyone a happy birthday!

Use the keyboard arrows to collect all the candles in every level and reach the monsters that wait for their birthday muffin.

There's 10 different monsters waiting for these muffins! Can you discover all of them?

Greeting cards with the Birthday Muffins available at jcseijo.redbubble.com
